Benefits of Cold Showers ❄️

A cold shower (typically below 70°F) might sound like a shock to the system, but the benefits are worth it!  

1. Boosts Alertness and Energy

Cold water jolts your body awake, increasing oxygen intake, heart rate, and circulation.
2/ Walking 10,000 steps daily (~7-8 km) can burn 300-400 calories, depending on your pace. Add this to a calorie-conscious Indian diet for visible results.

Did you know walking 10,000 steps daily can help you shed weight & boost your metabolism? 🚶‍♀️ Pair it with Indian staples like dal, sabzi, & roti for a balanced fitness journey. #SustainableWeightLoss #FitnessIndia #weightlosstips
